original_solution_mapping.L1: Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250>>250 pages.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Reading the first half took Jane 250 / 10 = <<250/10=25>>25 days.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Reading the second half of the book took Jane 250 / 5 = <<250/5=50>>50 days.
original_solution_mapping.L4: So in total Jane needed 25 + 50 = <<25+50=75>>75 days to read the whole book.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2052.
    Returns: the total number of days Jane spent reading the book.
    """
    # L1
    total_pages = 500 # 500 page book
    half_divisor = 2 # Half of the book
    half_pages = total_pages / half_divisor

    # L2
    speed_first_half = 10 # speed of 10 pages per day
    days_first_half = half_pages / speed_first_half

    # L3
    speed_second_half = 5 # speed of 5 pages a day
    days_second_half = half_pages / speed_second_half

    # L4
    total_days = days_first_half + days_second_half

    # FA
    answer = total_days
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Half of the book means {total_pages} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_pages}/{half_divisor}={half_pages}>>{half_pages} pages.
Reading the first half took Jane {half_pages} / {speed_first_half} = <<{half_pages}/{speed_first_half}={days_first_half}>>{days_first_half} days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane {half_pages} / {speed_second_half} = <<{half_pages}/{speed_second_half}={days_second_half}>>{days_second_half} days.
So in total Jane needed {days_first_half} + {days_second_half} = <<{days_first_half}+{days_second_half}={total_days}>>{total_days} days to read the whole book.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250>>250 pages.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Reading the first half took Jane 250 / 10 = <<250/10=25>>25 days.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Reading the second half of the book took Jane 250 / 5 = <<250/5=50>>50 days.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: So in total Jane needed 25 + 5 = <<25+5=30>>30 days to read the whole book.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'speed_second_half' (value: 5) was used instead of 'days_second_half' (value: 50.0).
